Class Utils 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----Utils
public class Utils
extends Object
Utils.java my un-sorted utilities. provides: debugging timers, thread delays.

Version:
99.3.1
Author:
Brian Maltzan

Utils()

coord_to_spherical(T3d)
convert point to rho, phi, theta.
do_matrix_tran(T3d[], int, TMatrix3d)
return new T3d[], transform points by mat.
do_matrix_tran_pt(T3d, TMatrix3d)
return new T3d, from points by mat.
do_projection_tran(T3d[], int, double)
project 3d coordinates onto 2d plane
do_viewport_tran(T2d[], int)
get_rotate3d_x_mat(double)
rotate around x-axis
get_rotate3d_y_mat(double)
rotate around y-axis
get_rotate3d_z_mat(double)
rotate around z-axis
get_time()
return current time in milliseconds.
get_view_matrix(double, double, double)
generate world to viewing coordinate transform matrix.
pause(int)
halt execution for specified milliseconds.
pause(int, int)
halt execution for specified milliseconds, and 0-999999 additional nanoseconds.
reset_timer()
clears all timer values stored
round_double(double, int)
round to n-th place.
scale3d(T3d[], int, T3d)
3d scaling
set_timer()
store the current time, can store up to 10 times.
sign(double)
return -1 or 1, depending on pos or neg value.
spherical_to_coord(double, double, double)
timer_dif(int, int)
returns time difference between times i and j if i,j exist and j>i.
tran3d(T3d, T3d)
3d translation

Utils 
 public Utils()

set_timer 
 public static final void set_timer()
store the current time, can store up to 10 times.

reset_timer 
 public static final void reset_timer()
clears all timer values stored

timer_dif 
 public static final long timer_dif(int i,
                                    int j)
returns time difference between times i and j if i,j exist and j>i.

Parameters:
i - i_th time stored
j - j_th time stored
pause 
 public static final void pause(int milli)
halt execution for specified milliseconds.

Parameters:
milli - milliseconds to suspend program execution
pause 
 public static final void pause(int milli,
                                int nano)
halt execution for specified milliseconds, and 0-999999 additional nanoseconds.

get_time 
 public static final long get_time()
return current time in milliseconds.

sign 
 public static final int sign(double d)
return -1 or 1, depending on pos or neg value.

round_double 
 public static final double round_double(double num,
                                         int places)
round to n-th place.

Parameters:
num - number to be rounded.
places - number of decimals to keep.
tran3d 
 public static final void tran3d(T3d p1,
                                 T3d modifier)
3d translation

get_rotate3d_x_mat 
 public static final TMatrix3d get_rotate3d_x_mat(double angle)
rotate around x-axis

get_rotate3d_y_mat 
 public static final TMatrix3d get_rotate3d_y_mat(double angle)
rotate around y-axis

get_rotate3d_z_mat 
 public static final TMatrix3d get_rotate3d_z_mat(double angle)
rotate around z-axis

scale3d 
 public static final T3d[] scale3d(T3d points[],
                                   int n,
                                   T3d scale)
3d scaling

spherical_to_coord 
 public static final T3d spherical_to_coord(double rho,
                                            double phi,
                                            double theta)
coord_to_spherical 
 public static final T3d coord_to_spherical(T3d p)
convert point to rho, phi, theta. assume for origin of (0,0,0).

get_view_matrix 
 public static final TMatrix3d get_view_matrix(double rho,
                                               double phi,
                                               double theta)
generate world to viewing coordinate transform matrix. 
        | -sin(theta)            cos(theta)            0         0   |
   Tv = | -cos(phi)*cos(theta)  -cos(phi)*sin(theta)   sin(phi)  0   |
        | -sin(phi)*cos(theta)  -sin(phi)*sin(theta)  -cos(phi)  rho |
        |  0                     0                     0         1   |

do_matrix_tran 
 public static final T3d[] do_matrix_tran(T3d points[],
                                          int n,
                                          TMatrix3d mat)
return new T3d[], transform points by mat.

do_matrix_tran_pt 
 public static final T3d do_matrix_tran_pt(T3d points,
                                           TMatrix3d mat)
return new T3d, from points by mat.

do_projection_tran 
 public static final T2d[] do_projection_tran(T3d points[],
                                              int n,
                                              double d)
project 3d coordinates onto 2d plane

do_viewport_tran 
 public static final Point[] do_viewport_tran(T2d points[],
                                              int n)
